background: Grew up as the cartographer in the Kadrius system, starting out with: Admin-0, Athletics-0, Carouse-0, Drive-0, Survival-0
education: Attended university on Kadrius.  learned Navigation-0, and Medic-1.  Did not graduate.  In Pre-Career Event, a Life Event, with almost died in an accident on campus, left before graduating. Eventually received healing to strength, but incurred some debt
terms: Scientist (Researcher): Scientist basic training. Increased in rank to Researcher/1, gaining Electronics (Sensors)-1, and Investigate-1. Worked in an orbiting laboratory, gaining Vacc Suit-1.

Scientist (Researcher): Employer cancelled research.  Continued research with another pack of researchers, gained an enemy contact of the previous employer.  Gained Science (Archeology)-1.  Gained another rank to Researcher/2, advancing skill to Science (Archeology)-2.  In mustering out, gained +1 EDU, and 50,000cr, minus 22,500 to healing from university wounds

Merchant (Scrounger): Received rank Broker-1, Increased in rank to Scrounger/1, gaining skill Mechanic-1 and Electronics (Computers)-1.  Did a lot of business with one company, gaining 1 ally in the Menderes Corporation.  Mustered out with 50000cr and a piece of Scientific Equipment
